messages.messageBody:
happy to! But haven't found Polish-American lit. yet -- anyone out
there who can help?

david

Michelle Harper wrote:

> David...will you please post some of your book sources for you r
> project.....I am interested...especially of your findings in Polish-
> American literature.....when you find it. Thanks. Michelle

--
I will touring the East Coast September 1-19, giving homeschooling talks
and workshops related to "And the Skylark Sings with Me". For dates, and
locations, check out my website at www.skylarksings.com or send an
e-mail to shantinik@...
